about_the_game:
The addition of a new Heroin!
Enjoying the story of Werewolf Ninja. Inoka Mochitsuki.
Let's solve the puzzle and liberate her from"The World of GLASS"!

In the days when the world was consumed by the chaos of war, there was an organization that took upon themselves to maintain order
within the blood-soaked land.

Often called Ninjas or Kunoichi, their lord, the Princess tasked them with eradicating evil groups that avoided law's punishment.
Inoka Mochizuki, a commader of an elite unit, is from this organization.

Inoka moves by melting into the darkness, and her speed is such that the target doesn't even realize their own death.
She strikes fear into the wicked, but to her colleagues, she is very warm and affectionate.

One day, Inoka is informed that a member of her unit has been captured and sets off on a rescue mission by herself. It was the full moon,
and thus very dangerous for a beast-man such as herself, but this didn't stop Inoka from infiltrating the official's mansion.

Unfortunately, the captured member, after enduring harsh torture, revealed information on Inoka, and then Inoka was also captured. At the moment Inoka abandoned her lingering desire for life, the will of the World of Glass engulfed her.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that is not suitable for all ages or may be inappropriate for use at work place : nudity or sexual suggestive content - scene of sexual activity,  
sexual assault/non-consensual sex. this game appropriate only for adult audiences

All characters related to game content are 18 years of age or older, and the game is made of 2D animation-style characters, not real characters.

In the days when the world was consumed by the chaos of war, there was an organization that took upon themselves to maintain order

Often called Ninjas or Kunoichi, their lord, the Princess tasked them with eradicating evil groups that avoided law's punishment.

Unfortunately, the captured member, after enduring harsh torture, revealed information on Inoka, and then Inoka was also captured. At the moment Inoka abandoned her lingering desire for life, the will of the World of Glass engulfed her.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.12 or Later
  • Processor: 1.2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphic card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
